lead_paragraph: Haiti's earthquake in January took a poor nation by surprise and plunged it into deep pain and despair. The photos out of Chile after the magnitude-8.8 earthquake Saturday show the devastation that can happen from a powerful earthquake in a country that has long come to expect the earth to move. The death toll has passed 700.
snippet: The earthquake in Chile has revived one San Francisco Bay Area resident's interest in her earthquake preparedness....

headline.main: The Ebb and Flow of Preparedness in Earthquake Zones

abstract: The earthquake in Chile has revived one San Francisco Bay Area resident's interest in her earthquake preparedness.
